featured.text: The one thing I can guarantee is none of us will have taken a cruise, none of us will be sitting on a beach with a pina colada.

definition.zh_def: 一種以椰子奶和水果為基底的雞尾酒，通常用於調製飲品。
definition.en_def: A cocktail made with coconut milk and fruit, often used in mixed drinks.
definition.example: She ordered a piña colada while relaxing on the beach.
